product_name: Marmot Lindsey Component 3-in-1 Insulated Jacket - Women's
long_description: The Marmot Lindsey Component 3-in-1 jacket features a plush removable liner jacket for cozy comfort on any snowy playground that's calling your name. MemBrain(R) 2-layer waterproof, breathable laminated fabric fends off moisture and wind while reducing internal condensation, so you stay dry, warm and comfortable. Removable fleece liner jacket hoards warmth on the inside, or can be worn alone on milder days. Zip-off storm hood with laminated brim lets you adapt to variable conditions. Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves allow unrestricted range of motion. Easy-access storage includes handwarmer pockets, flapped sleeve pockets and zippered pockets for goggles and electronics. Rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs, drawcord hem and powder skirt customize fit and keep snow on the outside. Marmot Lindsey Component 3-in-1 jacket is 100% seam-taped to create the ultimate seal against snow and water.
short_description: The Marmot Lindsey Component 3-in-1 jacket features a plush removable liner jacket for cozy comfort on any snowy playground that's calling your name.
